frase1: Here there's no issue. I'm capable of communicating clearly and objectively, expressing my ideas effectively in both formal and informal interactions.
frase2: I can adapt to new and dynamic environments, learning new technologies, being receptive to feedback, and adjusting as needed according to the project's requirements. It's my favorite part.
